title: Silkroad Client Downloader IV -  NOT FULL CLIENT
description:
Feb. 24, 2009 Joymax, an independent developer and publisher of interactive entertainment for the global market, today announced that Legend IV: Tomb of the Qin-Shi Emperor, an update for historical fantasy MMORPG Silkroad Online, is nearing completion and will soon be ready for a worldwide launch. BeakYung, the ancient white viper, has accidentally been awakened from her meditation by humans exploring the Tomb of Qin-Shi. The warriors and mages of Silkroad Online must rally together and fight their way through the dungeonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s powerful guardians if they intend to face her wrath and restore order to the imperial tomb.

To aid in these efforts, the Legend IV update brings with it a number of potent new weapons, tough armor sets, and high-level abilities for both races, as well as a variety of new quests on Roc Mountain. The dungeon itself is open to players at level 70 or above with six floors containing nearly 50 never-before-seen monsters that must be defeated before facing BeakYung herself!

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œEach update allows us to expand the storyline, and add depth and color to the rich history of Silkroad Online.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½
